input.sentences: here is our little one joining us for the adventure !
here is daddy exploring the natural area .
here are my two men in front of a big rock !
here is the whole family at the beach !
our little one is all by himself at the beach !
output.sentences: NOW where are they taking me?
Don't tell me Dad wants me to deal with all that sand!
Am I supposed to be impressed by this old stone wall?
Yup, they did it, they brought me to the sand.
Good, back safe and sound in my stroller.
